website_summaries.verdict: Although a lot of consumers found the Reebok Run Supreme 3.0 MT to be an efficient running gear, the majority’s consensus is towards the negative. Several users were disappointed with the shoe’s construction and overall finish, while some had complaints about sizing. Overall, many felt that it was not a shoe worth recommending.
pros: One runner commented that the Reebok Run Supreme 3.0 MT was lightweight and easy to run in
The shoe was comfortable enough to wear daily, according to a user
Some wearers agreed that the shoe was durable
A runner was amazed at how the shoe helped in reducing fatigue
The Run Supreme 3.0 MT offered a lot of support, a consumer stated
One user reported an effortless running experience with the shoe
cons: Many people stated that the insole of their shoe was too short and too thin
The outsole was very rigid and uncomfortable, a tester complained
Although the Run Supreme 3.0 MT was a dependable shoe, it looked and felt cheap, wrote a reviewer
The shoe caused damage to the toe, a user lamented
The toe box was too tight, said a runner

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, but buy a half size up!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this shoe in the mail today. Please listen to the other reviews and order at least one half size up!!! I am a woman (buying men's shoes). Normally wear an 8.5 womens, 7 in men's. Bought these in a 7.5 men's after ordering a women's pair of Reeboks that was too small. The half size up fits perfectly, even with the slightly thicker dryfit socks i wear to the gym. Would recommend, but be careful with sizing. Super comfy otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Sizing issues....but good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 10 in everything and these were too small on me. I would recommend getting at least 1/2 size larger than you usually get. They were really good quality though and extremely light when I put them on. I would recommend if they came in the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Malhammers

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THE COLORS
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors, style and how lightweight they are. very comfortable even tho my 10 1/2 fit more like a 10..
customer_reviews.author: michael wilks

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Like that the inserts are padded, very comfortable for the first year. Bottom of the shoe material wears down VERY QUICKLY
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: couldnt wear them, caused sore feet, aching arches and knees
customer_reviews.author: lm

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed with this as they are advertised as running shoes
customer_reviews.text: The bottom sole cushion immediately came loose in these shoes within the first two times of wearing them. I was very disappointed with this as they are advertised as running shoes. My son now has the constant problem of having to stop and reposition the cushion. I wish I had returned them before the window of time closed. The shoes are a disappointment in quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chesterton, Indiana

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not true to size on this one, kinda strange because I buy this brand often and it usually is.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: He says they are comfortable and fit well
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these! He says they are comfortable and fit well. He really like the style too.
customer_reviews.author: JCakes

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, affordable shoe for short/medium run
customer_reviews.text: Bought a half-size up based on previous reviews. Seems about right, maybe a quarter-size up would have been just right. Comfortable, affordable shoe for short/medium run walks
customer_reviews.author: bobrob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Fit perfectly and handle my workouts great!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan D.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome pair of shoes. They are very comfortable, and the memory foam insoles are so soft. This is my first pair of Reeboks and I will definitely buy this brand in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah E. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good looking
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and good looking. Worth the cheap price however the soles feel thin and I would not want to run long distances in this shoe. I will probably use these as gym shoes and for walking around town.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Good outside but not inside
customer_reviews.text: Fit good, comfortable, and like the style but the insoles move since day 1. If u do much side to side movement they move and it gets annoying
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Freyenberger

customer_reviews.title: Thinking they will stretch just enough to fit better as time goes
customer_reviews.text: normally I buy size 9 1/2. Reeboks must be sized small, because I ordered size 10 and they are still a little tight. Thinking they will stretch just enough to fit better as time goes. Here's hoping.
customer_reviews.author: waynetta

customer_reviews.title: looks like the glue came off the insert
customer_reviews.text: Inside of shoe came apart when getting shoes out of box, looks like the glue came off the insert.
customer_reviews.author: don't download

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit, looks as it does online and are comfortable. That's all that needs to be said.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Eric Niebrugge

customer_reviews.title: The inner sole for these shoes are badly designed and ...
customer_reviews.text: The inner sole for these shoes are badly designed and they crumple while walking and come off while taking shoes off. It hurts feet.
customer_reviews.author: Rajinder Kaul

customer_reviews.title: Great color, perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for our son. He is delighted; loves the color. Says they fit perfect. He's normally 9 or 9.5 so these fit just right.
customer_reviews.author: Ed instead

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Affordable
customer_reviews.text: The memory foam makes these some of the most comfortable shoes I've ever had. And the price was unbeatable.
customer_reviews.author: Joel E. Vill

customer_reviews.title: He said it's like walking on clouds 😊
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loves them! He said it's like walking on clouds 😊
customer_reviews.author: Kass

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes for a good price and very good shipping
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Walking on clouds.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable shoe. Ran 5 miles yesterday on a trail and my feet/body feel 100% today. If I didnt remember, I wouldn't of even known I went on a run. Reebok definitely stepped their game up. Insoles are essentially memory foam. 👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Diferent color
customer_reviews.text: Y wanted black shoes and I recived grey with blue ones
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Puñales

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and look like you're wearing a cinder block on your foot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Reebok Mens Run Supreme 3.0 Mt
product_meta.description: Outrun your competition in the Reebok Run Supreme 2.0 shoe. A low-cut profile and forefoot flex grooves give you real mobility, while a lightweight outsole gives you superior cushioning. Plus, your foot stays secure with the midfoot strap lacing system. A graphic fade heel makes these shoes stand out in style.
feature_bullets: Leather and mesh upper for support and breathability.
Lightweight foam bottom provides superior comfort.
Bold delta branding and pop color details; Forefoot flex grooves for flexibility.
Memory Tech sockliner delivers additional cushion; Low-cut design for freedom of motion and quicker transitions.
Midfoot straps integrated into the lacing system for a more secure fit.
